graphql.query:
mutation {
  addEmployee(
    id: "1245",
    firstName: "Ryan",
    lastName: "Tran",
    email: "ryan.123@georgebrown.ca",
    gender: "Male",
    designation: "Data Management",
    salary: 500000,
    dateOfJoining: "2023-01-01",
    department: "IT",
    employeePhoto: ""
  ) {
    id
    firstName
    email
    designation
  }
}

query {
  getAllEmployees {
    id
    firstName
    lastName
    email
    gender
    designation
    salary
    dateOfJoining
    department
    employeePhoto
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}
